channel.title: Activate PK drops? :S
channel.description:
Hello, I'm using DeltaScape source atm (trying to learn more about coding) and when I kill someone in wildy, they does not lose their stuff. Monsters drops items, etc. But if a player dies, it wont lose anything. Could someone of you out there maybe tell me how to acivate PK drops?
Thanks ~ Extoz
